name: Professional Commando Sniper S
description:
Professional Commando Sniper Shoot is the latest commando sniper shooting game.It has beautiful frames,and is simple to control. As a commando, you need a great courage in the face of the fierce enemy. You must destroy the enemies , complete the tasks. The game is totally free.You can get the gold coins by shooting the enemys, so you can buy other more advanced guns.
Features:
- realistic shooting effect
- Real scene environment
- Smart AI
- Challenging missions
- powerful sniper rifle
- amazing music and sound effects
